Deprecated Version (“kunit/alpha/master”)

Here we have a copy of the documentation taken from the old “alpha” version KUnit.

You should really prefer using the upstream version if possible, but the alpha version has some features that still haven’t made their way upstream (class mocking, feature mocking, death tests, etc.)

Where to get the code

https://kunit.googlesource.com/linux/+/kunit/alpha/master

Getting Started Guide

docs/
